ContactPointAddress.name: ContactPointAddress
ContactPointAddress.description: Represents a contact’s billing or shipping address, which is associated with an individual or person account.

ActiveFromDate.description: The date when the contact’s address became active.

ActiveToDate.description: The date when the contact’s address is no longer active.

AddressFirstName.description: First name associated with the address.

AddressLastName.description: Last name associated with the address.

AddressMiddleName.description: Middle name associated with the address.

BestTimeToContactEndTime.description: The latest time to contact the individual.

BestTimeToContactStartTime.description: The earliest time to contact the individual.

BestTimeToContactTimezone.description: The timezone applied to the best time to contact the individual.

CompanyName.description: Company name associated with the address.

ContactPointPhoneId.description: Represents the primary phone number associated with this address.

GeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether a contact’s address is the preferred method of communication (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether a contact’s address is their primary address (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

IsThirdPartyAddress.description: Indicates whether the address is associated with a third party (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last referenced a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Latitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

Longitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

Name.description: Required. The name of the contact point address record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the account’s owner associated with this contact.

ParentId.description: The ID of the contact’s parent record. Only an individual or account can be a contact’s parent.

PhoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the address.

PreferenceRank.description: Preference rank when there are multiple contact point addresses.

UsageType.description: Specify the usage type of this address. For instance, whether it’s a work address or a home address.
